about_the_game:
The Official Soundtrack for Tandem: A Tale of Shadows was composed and arranged by Guillaume Nicollet.

Let yourself be enchanted by the charming and mysterious atmosphere of Emma and Fanton’s search for Thomas Kane.

The music in Tandem: A Tale of Shadows brings atmospheric tunes that, combined with advanced sound design, gives it an evocative nature that you can really enjoy in the video game!

This soundtrack includes no less than 14 titles that all have been masterized and optimized for digital audio.

From cute and nostalgic music box melodies to eerie atmospheric pieces discover the Tandem: A Tale of Shadows Soundtrack now!

For streamers, all 14 titles are DMCA-safe and suitable for streaming and replay videos!
